text:
@MSNBC .@GovPenceIN Can go directly to a fiery Blaze!
He went on TV on 26June20 stated that #COVID19 is under control & in the 50 States, the Curve has been Flattened...A wickedly proven LIE from a so-called Christian(Folks, Christ Never once told a Lie). LYING is a sin against God.
